ai-patthana17.23:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.23:0.3_0: Not over-exertion, they look forwards and so on.
ai-patthana17.23:1.1_0: Not grasping is a cause of skillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana17.23:2.1_0: Not grasping is a cause of skillful qualities. ... those skillful qualities aren’t apply to by not grasping.
ai-patthana17.23:3.1_0: Not grasping arises in someone who doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, or practice a cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.23:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.23:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.23:4.1_0: What doesn’t arise in someone who hasn’t fondness, ill will, and lacks good will, because of grasping the cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.23:4.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
